statements: SELECT * FROM Episodes WHERE episode_id = 1;
SELECT episode_title, episode_description FROM Episodes WHERE platform = 'Apple Podcasts';
SELECT episode_title, publication_date FROM Episodes WHERE download_count > 1000 ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT episode_id, episode_title, episode_duration FROM Episodes WHERE episode_duration < 30 ORDER BY episode_duration ASC;
SELECT episode_id, platform, COUNT(*) AS episode_count FROM Episodes GROUP BY platform HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM Episodes WHERE episode_id = 1;
SELECT episode_title, episode_description, publication_date FROM Episodes WHERE platform = 'YouTube' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT episode_title, episode_duration FROM Episodes WHERE download_count > 1000 AND platform IN ('Spotify', 'Apple Podcasts') ORDER BY episode_duration;
SELECT episode_id, episode_title, download_count FROM Episodes WHERE episode_duration < 30 AND download_count < 500 ORDER BY download_count ASC;
SELECT episode_id, episode_title, publication_date FROM Episodes WHERE episode_title LIKE '%interview%' AND download_count > 500 ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM episodes;
SELECT title, description, duration FROM episodes WHERE duration > 30 ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT title, rating FROM episodes WHERE publish_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT episode_id, title, duration FROM episodes WHERE duration < 20 AND title ILIKE '%database%';
SELECT listener_name, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY submission_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM episodes;
SELECT title, description FROM episodes WHERE duration > 30 ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, listener_name, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4 AND episode_id IN (SELECT episode_id FROM episodes WHERE duration < 60);
SELECT * FROM episodes e INNER JOIN feedback f ON e.episode_id = f.episode_id WHERE f.rating < 3 ORDER BY publish_date ASC;
SELECT listener_name, feedback_text, submission_date FROM feedback WHERE listener_name LIKE 'A%' OR feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY listener_name DESC, submission_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PodcastEpisode;
SELECT episode_title, episode_duration FROM PodcastEpisode WHERE episode_duration > 30;
SELECT episode_title, episode_release_date FROM PodcastEpisode ORDER BY episode_release_date DESC;
SELECT listener_id, feedback_text FROM ListenerFeedback WHERE listener_id = 123;
SELECT DISTINCT listener_id FROM DownloadStatistics ORDER BY listener_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM PodcastEpisode WHERE episode_id = 1;
SELECT episode_title, episode_duration FROM PodcastEpisode WHERE episode_duration > 30;
SELECT episode_id, episode_release_date FROM PodcastEpisode ORDER BY episode_release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ListenerFeedback WHERE listener_id = 10 ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;

SELECT episode_title, COUNT(download_id) AS total_downloads FROM PodcastEpisode JOIN DownloadStatistics ON PodcastEpisode.episode_id = DownloadStatistics.episode_id GROUP BY episode_title ORDER BY total_downloads DESC;
SELECT * FROM episodes;
SELECT title, description FROM episodes WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comment FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT listener_id, name, location FROM listeners ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT downloads.listener_id, episodes.title, downloads.download_date FROM downloads JOIN episodes ON downloads.episode_id = episodes.episode_id;
SELECT * FROM episodes;
SELECT episode_id, title, description FROM episodes WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT listeners.listener_id, listeners.name, feedback.rating FROM listeners JOIN feedback ON listeners.listener_id = feedback.listener_id WHERE feedback.rating > 3;
SELECT episodes.title, listeners.name, feedback.comment FROM episodes JOIN feedback ON episodes.episode_id = feedback.episode_id JOIN listeners ON feedback.listener_id = listeners.listener_id;

SELECT downloads.download_id, episodes.title, listeners.name, downloads.download_date FROM downloads JOIN episodes ON downloads.episode_id = episodes.episode_id JOIN listeners ON downloads.listener_id = listeners.listener_id ORDER BY downloads.download_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM episodes;
SELECT episode_title, release_date FROM episodes WHERE podcast_id = 1;
SELECT listener_name, email FROM listeners WHERE subscription_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT episode_title, duration FROM episodes ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT episode_title, rating, comment FROM episodes e INNER JOIN feedback f ON e.episode_id = f.episode_id WHERE f.rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM episodes ORDER BY release_date DESC, duration ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT episode_title, release_date FROM episodes WHERE podcast_id = 1 AND duration > '00:25:00';
SELECT feedback.comment, listeners.listener_name FROM feedback JOIN listeners ON feedback.listener_id = listeners.listener_id ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT episode_title, downloads_count FROM episodes JOIN statistics ON episodes.episode_id = statistics.episode_id WHERE downloads_count > 100 ORDER BY downloads_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT listeners.listener_name FROM listeners JOIN downloads ON listeners.listener_id = downloads.listener_id ORDER BY listener_name ASC LIMIT 5;
